mapper.insert: insert into base_course (id, course_code, name, start_time, end_time, state, is_deleted, teacher_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{courseCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{teacherCode,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update base_course set course_code = #{courseCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, teacher_code = #{teacherCode,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, course_code, name, start_time, end_time, state, is_deleted, teacher_code from base_course
